__e: Yes, but they deny having done it together.
I don't hate you, but you did this, and you can try to get out of it, but what you can't do anymore is deny you did it.
Because I'm sorry. And if anyone ever asks, I'll deny ever saying this, but... I know you all knew.
Do you deny this confession, and do you realise what will happen if you do?
- Well there's one thing for sure, they're here and there's nothing we can do about it.
So you're not denying you'd keep the way to Earth to yourself if you could.
For your good, it will be needed you always to refuse to suppose that the Child belongs to you.
Look, I'm not gonna deny that... that, you know, maybe...
I can't deny that our path has been complicated, but in the end, love makes everything simple.
